summary: A small town deals with an invasion of rattlesnakes.
cast: Harry Hamlin|Shannon Sturges|David Spielberg|Patty McCormack|Beau Billingslea|Phillip Troy Linger|Jack Scalia|David Whitney|David Webb|Carolyn Bock|Beth Champion|Sandra Bell|Kirsty Boden|Darce Florio|Paul Tassone|Nathalie Roy|Mark Fairall|Dominic Purcell|Daniel Murphy|Amanda Dettrick|Antonia Murphy|Katy Charles|Tom Betts|Marc Arena|Michael Langdon|John Walkin
title: Asesinas silenciosas
